reviewComments: Found them on Groupon for hubby's bday and I would have paid full price! I don't drink beer, AT ALL, and they had a great selection. Even brought home two bottles.
Came for brewery tour and sampling flights. Outstanding products and customer interactions. Loved the 2 date beers. Great visit.
VERY COOL, a must stop on your way across the Coachella Valley. GO for the beer flights. Not a bad beer yet.
Great place to visit but go early. It fills up fast and is under staffed. The beer selection is large with very unique flavor. Order a flight of 4 oz beers so that you can sample... read more
